title: Apple Surges Ahead Despite Tariff Challenges and AI Delays
description: Apple reported fiscal third-quarter results exceeding expectations with $94.04 billion in revenue. Sales of iPhones increased notably. Despite tariff concerns and AI development delays, Apple maintains growth through strategic production shifts. Apple faced challenges in markets, while continuing to innovate in artificial intelligence and sustain its services business.
content:
Apple Inc. delivered far stronger-than-expected fiscal third-quarter results, reporting $94.04 billion in revenue, surpassing analyst predictions. Notably, iPhone sales grew by 13.5% to $44.58 billion, alleviating some tariff-related concerns.
Amidst... [473 chars]

title: Apple overcomes trade war to deliver surprisingly strong quarter
description: Apple shook off a thicket of tariffs and a botched entry into artificial intelligence to accelerate its revenue growth during its springtime quarter, but the trendsetting tech company still faces a bumpy road ahead that could lead to higher iPhone prices.

title: More Americans are turning to AI for health advice
description: A survey reveals 35% of Americans now use artificial intelligence for health management, from meal planning to fitness advice and medical concerns.
content:
NEW You can now listen to Fox News articles!
Forget typing symptoms into a search bar.
A growing number of Americans are now using artificial intelligence to manage their health and wellness.

title: Zhaoxin unveils new consumer and server CPUs aimed at challenging global semiconductor giants
description: This week, Chinese semiconductor company Zhaoxin introduced its latest generation of consumer and enterprise processors at the 2025 World Artificial Intelligence Conference in Shanghai. Two new flagship...
content: Why it matters: Zhaoxin's latest processors mark a key step in China's push for technological self-reliance, bringing new AI-focused chips that aim to challenge established global players. While still behind industry leaders, these advances reflect g... [3350 chars]

title: U.S Vogue ad models created with AI
description: American Vogue’s August 2025 issue has been making headlines after it was revealed that a model for an Guess advertisment was created using artificial intelligence.
content:
U.S. clothing brand Guess used AI-generated models in its latest campaign. The image was created by Seraphinne Vallora, an AI-driven marketing agency. (Seraphinne Vallora via CNN Newsource)

title: Meta beats expectations in Q2
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Meta reported robust second-quarter (Q2) financial results on Wednesday, with revenue jumping 22 percent year over year to $47.5 billion as the social media giant continues investing heavily in artificial intelligence (AI).
content: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Meta reported robust second-quarter (Q2) financial results on Wednesday, with revenue jumping 22 percent year over year to $47.5 billion as the social media giant continues investing heavily in artificial intelligence (AI)... [4146 chars]

title: ​Microsoft looks to spend record $30 billion
description: MICROSOFT forecast on Wednesday a record $30 billion in capital spending for the current fiscal first quarter, after booming sales in its Azure cloud computing business showcased the growing returns on its massive bets on artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Samsung Q2 operating profits plummets 50%
description: SEOUL — South Korean tech giant Samsung Electronics’ operating profit dropped by more than 50 percent year on year in the second quarter (Q2), its regulatory filing showed on Thursday, as US curbs on artificial intelligence (AI) chip exports to China hit sales.
